title: Ryan Penagos from Marvel Comics - Episode 79
itunes:title: Ryan Penagos from Marvel Comics - Episode 79
description:
It brings me great pleasure to share with you the conversation I had with Ryan Peganos who is the Executive Editorial Director for Marvel Digital aka dude in charge of all things digital for Marvel. He's an old punk and hardcore kid from Long Island and we discuss camaraderie, hard work and outsider art. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com. This show is part of the How We Are Network (howweare.org).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
